scripts.run-and-report-sorry: npm run run-and-report-part-1-sorry && npm run run-and-report-part-2
scripts.run-and-report-part-1-sorry: npm run delete-reports && npm run start-tests-sorry; true
scripts.run-and-report-dashboard: npm run run-and-report-part-1-dashboard && npm run run-and-report-part-2
scripts.run-and-report: npm run run-and-report-part-1 && npm run run-and-report-part-2
scripts.run-and-report-part-1: npm run delete-reports && npm run start-tests; true
scripts.run-and-report-part-1-dashboard: npm run delete-reports && npm run start-tests-dashboard; true
scripts.run-and-report-part-2: npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-report && open output.html
